verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>"Command<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>'When<s%> you <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H776>land<s%> that shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> to you as an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> [even the] <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> according to its <S%H1367>borders.<s%>

'Your <S%H5045>southern<s%> <S%H6285>sector<s%> shall <S%H1961>extend<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> <S%H5921>along<s%> the <S%H3027>side<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> and your <S%H5045>southern<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H1961>extend<s%> from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> <S%H9506>eastward.<s%>

'Then your <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H5437>turn<s%> [direction] from the <S%H5045>south<s%> to the <S%H4610>ascent<s%> of <S%H4610>Akrabbim,<s%> and <S%H5674>continue<s%> to <S%H6790>Zin,<s%> and its <S%H8444>termination<s%> shall be to the <S%H5045>south<s%> of Kadesh-barnea; and it shall <S%H3318>reach<s%> <S%H2692>Hazaraddar,<s%> and <S%H5674>continue<s%> to <S%H6111>Azmon.<s%>

'And the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H5437>turn<s%> [direction] from <S%H6111>Azmon<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and its <S%H8444>termination<s%> shall be at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

'As for the <S%H3220>western<s%> <S%H1366>border,<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> the <S%H1419>Great<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> that is, [its] <S%H1366>coastline;<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be your <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border.<s%>

'And <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be your <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H1366>border:<s%> you shall <S%H8376>draw<s%> your [border] <S%H8376>line<s%> from the <S%H1419>Great<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor.<s%>

'You shall <S%H8376>draw<s%> a <S%H8376>line<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> to the Lebo-hamath, and the <S%H8444>termination<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall be at <S%H6657>Zedad;<s%>

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H3318>proceed<s%> to <S%H2202>Ziphron,<s%> and its <S%H8444>termination<s%> shall be at Hazar-enan. <S%H2088>This<s%> shall be your <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H1366>border.<s%>
'For your <S%H9506>eastern<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> you shall also <S%H184>draw<s%> a <S%H1366>line<s%> from Hazar-enan to <S%H8221>Shepham,<s%>

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8221>Shepham<s%> to <S%H7247>Riblah<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6924>side<s%> of <S%H5871>Ain;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H9256>reach<s%> to the <S%H3802>slope<s%> on the <S%H9506>east<s%> <S%H9506>side<s%> of the <S%H3220>Sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinnereth.<s%>

'And the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> and its <S%H8444>termination<s%> shall be at the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> shall be your <S%H776>land<s%> according to its <S%H1367>borders<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around.<s%>' "

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H776>land<s%> that you are to <S%H5157>apportion<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> among you as a <S%H5157>possession,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H8672>nine<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribes.<s%>

"For the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7206>Reuben<s%> have <S%H3947>received<s%> [theirs] according to their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> and the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> according to their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> and the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> have <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>possession.<s%>

"The <S%H8147>two<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%> have <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>possession<s%> <S%H4480>across<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> opposite <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H9506>eastward<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrising.<s%>"
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H428>"These<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> shall <S%H5157>apportion<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to you for <S%H5157>inheritance:<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5387>leader<s%> of every <S%H4294>tribe<s%> to <S%H5157>apportion<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5157>inheritance.<s%>
"And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H376>men:<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh.<s%>
"And of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud.<s%>
"Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H449>Elidad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3692>Chislon.<s%>
"And of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> a <S%H5387>leader,<s%> <S%H1231>Bukki<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3020>Jogli.<s%>

"Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph:<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> a <S%H5387>leader,<s%> <S%H2592>Hanniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H641>Ephod.<s%>
"And of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> a <S%H5387>leader,<s%> <S%H7055>Kemuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8204>Shiphtan.<s%>
"And of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> a <S%H5387>leader,<s%> <S%H469>Elizaphan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6535>Parnach.<s%>
"And of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> a <S%H5387>leader,<s%> <S%H6409>Paltiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5821>Azzan.<s%>
"And of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> a <S%H5387>leader,<s%> <S%H282>Ahihud<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8015>Shelomi.<s%>
"And of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> a <S%H5387>leader,<s%> <S%H6300>Pedahel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud.<s%>"

<S%H428>These<s%> are those <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H5157>apportion<s%> the <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
